summary: This mods adds a flyable broomstick and a levitation spell. You can fly around everywhere with it and it will not clip into the terrain. It can also be used as a weapon, shooting deadly bolts of lighting.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ffd700][b]Flyable Broomstick v 0.4
by J3X[/b][/color]

[color=#ff0000][b]You need Skyrim v 1.6 or higher to use this mod.[/b][/color]

This mods adds a flyable broomstick and a levitation spell. You can fly around everywhere with it and it will not clip into the terrain. It can also be used as a weapon, shooting deadly bolts of lighting.
You must fight a witch in Alchemist's Shack, a small wooden shack located between Haemar's Shame and Ivarstead.
You can also craft the broom with one Broom and 3 Grand Soulgems.

You can find the spelltome for the levitation near Rannveig's Fast, ancient Nordic tomb, in the southern mountains of Hjaalmarch.


[color=#ffd700][b]HOW TO USE[/b][/color]
Drop the broom to make it rideable (pick it up, then drop it). Steer with your mouse and keyboard, if works as any ordinary horse, look up and down to travel up and down.

If you only want the levitation spell try Levitate - A Morrowind Spell for Skyrim by Daiyus - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26638
spidermax96 created a flyable magic carpet mod using the same scripts as this mod, check if out! - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31304/
Femme Fatale Mod by Chapmister333 allows you to transform into, among other things, a witch. It uses this mod. http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31692

[color=#ffd700][b]HUGE TOWER OF VIDEOS[/b][/color]
[youtube]IZ1QkJyD5T8[/youtube]
[youtube]IcsDPN1Gxu0[/youtube]
[youtube]IrUvaqrJa5U[/youtube]
[youtube]9cE8YGQQXQc[/youtube]
[youtube]z1CVsKdQ8wc[/youtube]
[youtube]SHPmxH8y2hY[/youtube]
[youtube]MgOTlMGaRoI[/youtube]
[youtube]VtVIA2NQQlg[/youtube]
[youtube]wwrkIVTsgb8[/youtube]
[youtube]XhwAygE0iRY[/youtube]
[youtube]MYLiQjcADXw[/youtube]
[youtube]FGhSCRbIR6I[/youtube]
[youtube]szpejKb0oDA[/youtube]


[color=#ffd700][b]INSTALLING[/b][/color]
- Install as any ordinary mod, dump all files inside skyrim/data & activate rideable-broom.esp.
- Travel to Alchemist's Shack and kill the witch carring the broom or craft it.
- Travel to Rannveig's Fast and find the spelltome.


[color=#ffd700][b]KNOWN BUGS[/b][/color]
- Do not use the levitation spell and the broom at the same time, this WILL cause bugs.
- Creatures and clutters near the broomstick might be influenced by it's strong magic field and behave weird.
- The broom thinks he is a horse so he makes horse sounds.
- Sometimes it's a bit hard to take of, look up in the sky and run with your broomstick!
- It might be possible for the broom to conflict with some clothes.
- You can use the broom to access areas you should not be able to access.


[color=#ffd700][b]RELEASE LOG[/b][/color]
0.1:
- Public release
0.2:
- Added recipe for broom.
- Altered flying script a bit, possibly reduced the number of altitude drops.
- The invisible floor should not block missiles now.
- Made the broom faster.
0.3:
- Added levitation spell & book.
- Added some more enemies at Rannveig's Fast (Liches!).
- Reduced the ammounts of altitude drops (perhaps even removed them!?)
- Fixed collision plane remaining when dismount bug.
0.3.1:
- Changed from a while loop to onUpdate for the Broom script.
0.4:
- It should be more easy to travel down now, it will use normal gravity when you look down and 0.1 gravity otherwise.

[color=#ffd700][b]CREDITS[/b][/color]
All credits to J3X for creating this mod.
Drop me a message at jex_ mus [at] hotmail [dot] com if you want anything.
Or contact me at SkyrimNexus as J3X.


[color=#ffd700][b]PERMISSION[/b][/color]
Clone, copy, spread, mutate, merge, and do whatever you want just as long you give me credit for my work.
If you upload this mod to any other site (don't upload to sites that make money from mods) please make sure that it's updated and link back to this site.
You do not need to ask for permission to use any parts of this mod.
If you create a modification to this mod please release it.
If you manage to fix some bug or add a new awesome feature please let it be included in this mod as well.


[b]I am no longer modding Skyrim but still provides tech support over email or PM.[/b]
[img]http://www.catalope.co/wp-content/uploads/2017/07/test2_.png[/img]
I run a small game studio called Catalope Games, if you enjoy my mods please check it out.
[b][url=http://www.catalope.co/]Official Webpage[/url] | [url=https://www.facebook.com/CatalopeGames/]Facebook[/url] | [url=https://twitter.com/CatalopeGames]Twitter[/url] | [url=http://steamcommunity.com/groups/Catalope]Join our Steam Group![/url][/b]
